# provider Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    homeauto = {
      version = "0.0.1"
      source  = "github.com/byteford/homeauto"
    }
  }
}
provider "homeauto" {
  host         = "http://127.0.0.1:8123"
  bearer_token = var.bearer_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **bearer_token** (String, Sensitive)
- **host** (String)
